channel.title: [PI] Combat bug with switching
channel.description:
I have a bug in my combat system, if someone for example wears a darkbow and shoots on someone. When the arrows are in the air and about to hit he can quickly switch to for example a handcannon and my system registers it as a hit with a handcannon (Thus a dubbel handcannon hit which can hit 50-50+)
This also works if you special someone with a dds and in the emote just before the damage is dealt and you switch to ags you can hit much with the stats of a ags.
Hope anyone knows the awnser :/

item.title: [PI] Combat bug with switching
item.dc:creator: @yoeril yoeril
item.description:
@yoeril wrote:

Mh fixed it already :o

item.title: [PI] Combat bug with switching
item.dc:creator: @yoeril yoeril
item.description:
@yoeril wrote:

Loveandpower:

sounds like whatever the damage formula etc is at /where it calculates the damage it isn’t updating the weapon being used or something. May I ask what source you are using?

Thanks for responding, I am using Entrana as you may remember from the tons of backdoors

Read full topic
